thumbnailStyleGuide.description: Style guide for creating thumbnails based on UndergroundExistence artist visuals.
thumbnailStyleGuide.aiPrompt: Transform a portrait photo into a high-contrast black and white image with a grainy texture, subtle vignette edges, and a soft blur to emulate a vintage analog photograph.
thumbnailStyleGuide.implementationNotes: Can be implemented programmatically using libraries like Python's PIL and OpenCV (see conversation context for example code).
